articles.title: Taiwan's Foxconn, TSMC confirm US$350 million COVID-19 vaccine deal with BioNTech - CNA
articles.description: TAIPEI: Taiwan's Foxconn and TSMC said on Monday (Jul 12) they had reached deals to buy 10 million doses of Germany's BioNTech's COVID-19 vaccine, putting the total cost of the highly politicised deal at about US$350 million.
